title: Epic 6: End-to-end CRUD integration tests
description: Integration test: init project, create issue, show it, update it, close it, delete it. Verify workflow in both implementations. This is Milestone 1 (M1).
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Goal: add end-to-end CRUD integration tests for Python and Rust. Acceptance: scenarios for create/show/update/close/delete in Gherkin or test harness; ensure parity.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Goal: end-to-end CRUD integration tests in Python and Rust. Acceptance: CLI scenarios for create/show/update/close/delete pass in both implementations.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Added end-to-end CRUD integration tests for Python and Rust. Ran: cd python && pytest; cd rust && cargo test
